Text.Tasks.5.TipsData.Desc: The player needs to give the sect a meeting gift to complete the visit, so please plan a trade area beforehand and select an appropriate trading item. More contents will only be unlocked after the visit is completed.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Click Sheet Music.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click Confirm.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Click Confirm.
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Click to close the World Map menu.
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: When a notification for a sect quest pops up, the player can gift the needed item in the Expand menu.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Click Okay.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click to open World Map.
Text.Tasks.16.TipsData.Desc: Once a sect quest has been triggered, a question mark will show above the Expand button, which means the player can offer help to another sect and gain connections.
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Click Expand in the top left to enter the Expand mode.
Text.Tasks.18.TipsData.Desc: Here's the quest item needed by the other sect. The player needs to place the prepared item in the trade area to give it to them.
Text.Tasks.21.TaskDesc: Click Confirm.
Text.Tasks.25.TipsData.Desc: There are many ways to gain connections with another sect, which affect future trade with the sect. Generally, trading with a sect will benefit from more connections with it.
Text.Tasks.30.TipsData.Desc: The player can see what items are tradable here. An item shown in red means the connections with the other sect are too low to trade this type of items.
Text.Tasks.31.TaskDesc: Click the item menu to zoom.
Text.Tasks.32.TipsData.Desc: The player can click and zoom to see more tradable types, like renting artifacts and asking for help from disciples with Golden Core.
Text.Tasks.34.TaskDesc: Click the item menu to zoom.
Text.Tasks.35.TaskDesc: Click Red Ginseng from Sect Items in the left.
Text.Tasks.36.TaskDesc: Click Blood Talisman from Player Items in the right.
Text.Tasks.39.TaskDesc: Click Blood Talisman from Player Items in the right.
Text.Tasks.44.TipsData.Desc: During sect trade, the player can use 'Attempt Trade' to estimate the value of the other sect's item, which helps to purchase the item at an appropriate price.

Text.Name: MapExplore
Text.Desc: Learn how to enter a location and begin exploration in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Click to open World Map.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click Mt. Nelumbo.
Text.Tasks.4.TipsData.Desc: Here shows the jurisdiction of the current location. If a location belongs to a power, disciples need to gain access from this power to go on adventure or camping there.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Click Trade.
Text.Tasks.7.TipsData.Desc: Access can be purchased in advance to freely enter all the locations belonged to the sect, which helps the player explore the other locations of the sect.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Click Access from Sect Access in the left.
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Click Earth Flux from Player Items in the right.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click Confirm.
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: The red area in World Map is where the player has no access to. You can purchase access to the areas that belonged to this power. After being unlocked, the area will turn to the normal color, which means the player can enter and explore there.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click to select Mt. Shu.
Text.Tasks.16.TipsData.Desc: Most locations in the game can be entered and explored by dispatching the disciple who is camping there.
Text.Tasks.19.TipsData.Desc: The player can send a disciple camping there to enter the map.
Text.Tasks.21.TaskDesc: Click Confirm.

Text.Name: MapExplore2
Text.Desc: Learn how to enter a location and begin exploration in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: The player can use the V key to move and explore the map.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to quickly accelerate to 2x Speed.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to quickly begin exploring.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Click Place and place it at the designated location.
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the continuous moving mode.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Wait for them to move.
Text.Tasks.11.TaskDesc: Click Hide and begin the hiding mode.
Text.Tasks.11.UiData.Name: Hide
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: When sneaking, if the eye-shaped icon on the disciple is red, they have a high chance of being spotted by others; if it is yellow, they have a low chance of being spotted; if it is white, they will not be spotted; if there is no eye-shaped icon, it means nobody here is concerned about the disciple's movement.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to quickly begin exploring.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click and move to the designated location.
Text.Tasks.16.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the continuous moving mode.
Text.Tasks.18.TipsData.Desc: The chance of being spotted is very much associated with the disciple's constitution and perception, and it is also influenced by the distance and difference in state between the disciple and the other character.
Text.Tasks.20.TipsData.Desc: Please remember that not all maps are safe. In some maps, there will be enemy targets or powers. There are also items and buildings in the map to interact with during exploration, which can be used to find out more contents. However, collecting an item of another sect when sneaking will have serious consequences if the disciple is spotted.
Text.Tasks.22.UiData.Name: Collect
Text.Tasks.23.TaskDesc: Click to collect the item Rebellious Blade.
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Wait for Rebellious Blade to be collected.
Text.Tasks.25.TipsData.Desc: Items collected by the player will be shown in this menu, and each disciple can carry six kinds of items at most. The player can discard unneeded items by clicking the corresponding button in the item menu. Collected items will be obtained once the disciple safely returns to the sect.
Text.Tasks.28.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to quickly begin exploring.
Text.Tasks.29.TaskDesc: Click and move to the designated location.
Text.Tasks.30.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the continuous moving mode.
Text.Tasks.32.TaskDesc: Click Hide and stops the hiding mode.
Text.Tasks.32.UiData.Name: Hide
Text.Tasks.34.TipsData.Desc: The player can click Leave to leave the current map and return to the sect, but the disciple needs to be safe first. They cannot leave the map if they are in battle. If the disciple's life is threatened, they will also be forced to leave.
Text.Tasks.36.TipsData.Desc: There are various other locations in the game, but the basic method of exploration is the same. Please be careful exploring the other maps and pay attention to the hidden dangers and opportunities.

Text.Name: Fight
Text.Desc: Learn the basic battle system and controls in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Click and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Check the Defeat mode in the left to the Status menu below.
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Check the Defense mode in the left to the Status menu below.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Check the Flee mode in the left to the Status menu below.
Text.Tasks.8.TipsData.Desc: These are the most common modes of controls during battle. Of course there are other modes waiting for the player to explore in the game.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Hold down the left mouse button and drag to select all the disciples in the room.
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: Issue the Attack order on the Monster.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} for Move.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click and move to the designated location.
Text.Tasks.17.TipsData.Desc: The player can use move and attack at the same time to draw out the battle and sometimes it can even turn the tide.
Text.Tasks.19.TaskDesc: Click the injured disciple in battle.
Text.Tasks.21.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} for Move.
Text.Tasks.22.TaskDesc: Move to a safer place in the sect.
Text.Tasks.23.TipsData.Desc: The player can use Flee to make injured disciples leave the battle and retreat to a safer place to ensure that no one dies.
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Click and select an inner disciple not in battle.
Text.Tasks.26.TaskDesc: Issue the Attack order on the Monster.
Text.Tasks.27.TipsData.Desc: The player can replace the disciples in the team during battle to continue the fight. Of course the player can arrange multiple teams to take turns to fight or receive supplies.
Text.Tasks.29.TipsData.Desc: In battle, the player can change controls in response to different situations to get an advantage over the enemy and prevent the sect from being destroyed.

Text.Name: ZhenFa
Text.Desc: Learn how to edit a formation and set members for the formation in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TipsData.Desc: Once a formation, auxiliary or pillar is obtained through any other method in the game, the player can create or check the formation here.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Click Formation.
Text.Tasks.3.TipsData.Desc: Here's all the formations the player owns. Click to check or modify any formation configuration.
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Click Create.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Click to select an auxiliary circle.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click to select the pillar Hidden Blade of Positivity.
Text.Tasks.8.TipsData.Desc: When editing a formation, the player needs to set up a pillar first, which can connect to other auxiliaries. There can only be one pillar.
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Click to select an auxiliary circle.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click to select the auxiliary Sword.
Text.Tasks.11.TipsData.Desc: When editing a formation, the player can place auxiliaries that connect to a corresponding formation link. If a link is correctly connected, the linked area will be green, for instance, the current auxiliary “Sword” has been properly activated.
Text.Tasks.12.TipsData.Desc: If an edited formation has an auxiliary that is not correctly connected, it will be shown as incomplete, and an incomplete formation cannot be formed.
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: Once an edited formation meets the requirements for Truth of Formations, it will obtain bonus effects. Different pillars have different Truth of Formations.
Text.Tasks.14.TipsData.Desc: Once the player has finished editing a formation, click Save to save the newly created formation.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click Return.
Text.Tasks.17.TipsData.Desc: Once a complete formation has been edited and saved, the player can appoint characters to this formation and be prepared to form it.
Text.Tasks.20.TaskDesc: Click the Config button in the right.
Text.Tasks.21.TaskDesc: Click to select the first one: Tutorial.
Text.Tasks.22.TipsData.Desc: The player can allocate an inner disciple to each pillar and auxiliary. Along the route from an auxiliary to the pillar, each time an element begets the next element, the auxiliary links will enjoy amplified special effects, and vice versa.
Text.Tasks.26.TipsData.Desc: A formation has nine different related stats. The player can check them through the Formation Assessment in the left.
Text.Tasks.27.TaskDesc: Click the Save button in the right.
Text.Tasks.28.TaskDesc: Click Close in the top right.
Text.Tasks.30.TipsData.Desc: Once the formation is complete and members have been allocated, the player can form the formation to activate it.
Text.Tasks.33.TipsData.Desc: Only the disciple at the pillar is able to form the formation. When all the disciples at the other auxiliaries are healthy and in the same area, the formation can be formed following the configuration.
Text.Tasks.35.TipsData.Desc: Before forming the formation, the player can check the details to confirm the actual bonus effects and stats after the formation is formed.
Text.Tasks.37.TaskDesc: Wait for the formation to be formed.
Text.Tasks.39.TipsData.Desc: Here's all the formation skills of the current formation, each of which has different uses.
Text.Tasks.40.TipsData.Desc: Here's the spell skills of the disciples in the formation.
Text.Tasks.41.TipsData.Desc: The player can use the controls here issue various orders to the formation.
Text.Tasks.43.TipsData.Desc: The player can check Focus to pay close attention to the operation of the formation, which helps to adjust the formation anytime in the battle.
Text.Tasks.45.TipsData.Desc: The player can arrange and combine different features to form a more suitable and powerful formation, and even master an ancient formation. Different formations have different effects, waiting for the player to explore, so this tutorial will not explain how to edit any other formations.

Text.Name: DragonHole
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn the influence of mysterious caverns and how to use Feng Shui relics to suppress them.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Click OK.
Text.Tasks.3.TipsData.Desc: When a certain period of time has passed in the game, a special secret will happen where a mysterious cavern will appear at a random spot in the location of the player's sect, and a Flood Dragon will be sleeping inside it. The player can use different methods to handle the situation, one of which is to use Feng Shui relics that make rooms very auspicious to suppress the cavern.
Text.Tasks.5.TipsData.Desc: There are many ways to handle a mysterious cavern, but for late-stage players who are still not sure what to do, choose Feng Shui relics to suppress it. As the other methods requires deeper understanding of the game, this tutorial will not go into details.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: An identified Feng Shui relic will have a detailed description. The player needs to refer to the description and place it in the right spot to correctly activate the relic. Once it is activated, it will instantaneously make the room very auspicious.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Click to select the Feng Shui relic Spirit Crystal.
Text.Tasks.9.UiData.Name: Place
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click to select Display.
Text.Tasks.11.TaskDesc: Select the room by clicking the empty area in it.
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: When placing a Feng Shui relic, the player can observe the Feng Shui change in the room here.
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Wait for them to be placed.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: When a Feng Shui relic is in an environment that meets the description, it will be a match that makes the room very auspicious, which can suppress the mysterious cavern.
Text.Tasks.16.TipsData.Desc: When the player successfully suppresses the mysterious cavern, the Flood Dragon in slumber will also be effectively subdued, and the player can use this window of time to improve the disciples' ability in order to destroy it sooner.

Text.Name: DragonFight
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn how to inspect the basic info on ancient beasts and use it to engage in battle with these beasts.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Chapters.1.DisplayName: Flood Dragon Body Parts in Battle
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Open the Secret menu in the right.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Click Ancient Beast.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click Flood Dragon.
Text.Tasks.4.TipsData.Desc: Once an ancient beast secret is unlocked, the player can check the info on the related skills of the boss.
Text.Tasks.5.TipsData.Desc: Here shows that the Flood Dragon is of Water element that is more suspectable to Earth damage.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Close the Secret menu.
Text.Tasks.8.TipsData.Desc: The player can encounter the other ancient beasts through different methods in the game, which will not be listed here in detail.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click Flood Dragon.
Text.Tasks.12.TipsData.Desc: You can keep track of Qi status of the Jiao-dragon's each body part through setting foci, and develop your strategy accordingly.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.16.TaskDesc: Click to open the Items & Equipment menu.
Text.Tasks.17.TipsData.Desc: According to the info above, we can wear an artifact of Earth element to attack the Flood Dragon.
Text.Tasks.18.TaskDesc: Click to close the Item & Equipment menu.
Text.Tasks.19.TaskDesc: Click the Attack button in the left of the character menu.
Text.Tasks.20.TipsData.Desc: The player can focus the attack on a specific body part to quickly destroy this part of the Flood Dragon.
Text.Tasks.22.TipsData.Desc: Each player uses different controls and strategies in battle, so this tutorial will not go into detail about battles, which the player can experience in the game. Once the boss is defeated, there will be different remains from its body, which can be searched for spoils. More body parts destroyed means more spoils to be obtained.

Text.Name: GetFood
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn how to quickly acquire food in an extremely difficult environment.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TipsData.Desc: When the player's food storage is insufficient, this notification will pop up.
Text.Tasks.3.TipsData.Desc: If the food storage is insufficient, the disciples in the player's sect may slowly starve to death, so the player needs to respond to this emergency, like going on adventures to obtain food.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click Nanping Village.
Text.Tasks.8.TipsData.Desc: Nanping Village is the nearest location with food resources.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: Use the slider to adjust the times of repeat adventure.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Click Okay.
Text.Tasks.16.TipsData.Desc: The player can simultaneously send multiple disciples on adventure and use repeat adventure to both lower the need for food in the sect and increase the output of food by adventure in a period of time. The player can then wait for the disciples to bring back food.

Text.Name: CombatWeather
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn some of the extreme weather in the game and how to handle them.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TipsData.Desc: When extreme weather happens in the player's sect, the player can check the Weather icon in the top left to see its duration. The player needs to adjust their strategy in time to handle the situation.
Text.Tasks.3.TipsData.Desc: When extreme weather happens, it will change the current temperature.
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Click to open the General Stats menu.
Text.Tasks.6.TipsData.Desc: The temperature stats of the disciples in the sect decide whether they will be affected by extreme weather.
Text.Tasks.8.TipsData.Desc: When a disciple in the player's sect is uncomfortable due to the extreme weather, it may cause injuries, and the disciple may die if the injuries are too severe.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click Equip Item.
Text.Tasks.10.UiData.Name: Equip
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: Click to equip Talisman of Supreme Yang.
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Wait for it to be equipped.
Text.Tasks.14.TipsData.Desc: A disciple can equip a talisman or use other methods to increase their temperature, which is the most direct way to deal with extreme weather.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click to close the General Stats menu.
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Select the room by clicking the empty area in it.
Text.Tasks.18.TipsData.Desc: There are many buildings or items that can increase the temperature in an area. The player can use them smartly to deal with extreme weather.
Text.Tasks.20.TipsData.Desc: There are more than one types of extreme weather. The player needs to use the items in the game wisely to better handle the other types of extreme weather.

Text.Name: Prestige
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn what Talisman of Invisibility is used for and how to use it to lower reputation.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Click the Sect button in the right.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: In the game, more reputation will invite stronger enemies to attack, so the player needs to utilize the items in the game to lower the obtained reputation.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click to close the Sect menu.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: The player can obtain the Talisman of Invisibility by drawing. When an inner disciple goes on adventure with an activated Talisman of Invisibility, it can effectively lower the obtained reputation.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Click Equip Item.
Text.Tasks.8.UiData.Name: Equip
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Click to equip Talisman of Invisibility.
Text.Tasks.11.TaskDesc: Wait for it to be equipped.
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: Reputation to some extent affects the player's sect, so the player can make use of the Talisman of Invisibility to lower the obtained reputation in order to manage the sect's reputation.

Text.Name: ShortcutKey
Text.Desc: Learn about the common hotkeys and how to customize hotkeys in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Chapters.1.Tasks.1: Use Hotkeys to Organize a Team
Text.Chapters.1.Tasks.2: Use Hotkeys to Move and Attack
Text.Tasks.2.TipsData.Desc: The player can click System and then Hotkeys to check the Hotkeys menu, where hotkeys can be customized and reset.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click to close the Hotkeys menu.
Text.Tasks.5.TipsData.Desc: The player can adjust the hotkeys to suit their habit and use them accordingly.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey F1 for Eat.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey F2 for Equip Item.
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Hold down the left mouse button and drag to select all the disciples in the room.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Use Left Ctrl and the key 1 to organize them into Team 1.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel.
Text.Tasks.16.TaskDesc: Use the key 1 to choose Team 1.
Text.Tasks.19.TaskDesc: Issue the Attack order on the Monster.
Text.Tasks.21.TaskDesc: Issue a Move order to move to the designated location.
Text.Tasks.23.TipsData.Desc: There are many controls that can be done by hotkeys. The player can adjust them according to their habit. The player can place the cursor on the buttons to check the other hotkeys, so this tutorial will not go into detail about them.

Text.Name: Batch
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn some of the common batch tasks in the game and how to issue them.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Click and select a disciple.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: The player can place the cursor to see the hotkey for issuing a batch task of Eat. The player can press Left Shift and left-click multiple food to eat them in batch.
Text.Tasks.2.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click the Eat button.
Text.Tasks.3.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Press Shift and select the items to be eaten.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the selection mode.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Click Cancel in the bottom menu.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Drag and select a target area while holding Ctrl to issue Rebuild in batch.
Text.Tasks.9.TipsData.Desc: The player can use Ban in batch to ban some of the items that are not currently needed.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Drag and select a target area while holding Ctrl to issue Cancel Ban in batch.
Text.Tasks.11.TipsData.Desc: The player can use Cancel Ban in batch to cancel the ban on some of the banned items.
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the selection mode.
Text.Tasks.14.TipsData.Desc: The player can use Rebuild in batch to rebuild the damaged buildings.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Click Demolish in the bottom menu.
Text.Tasks.16.TaskDesc: Drag and select a target area while holding Ctrl to issue Rebuild in batch.
Text.Tasks.17.TipsData.Desc: Once the player uses Rebuild in batch, the outer disciples scheduled for construction will automatically go to the damaged buildings and rebuild them.
Text.Tasks.19.TipsData.Desc: There are other forms of batch tasks in the game, waiting for the player to explore.

Text.Name: AreaExpand
Text.Desc: In this tutorial, learn how to quickly expand the various areas in buildings and use area expansion to inherit the area stats.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TipsData.Desc: When the storage hits full capacity, the player can expand the area of storage to increase its capacity.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to open the Build page.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Click the Area page.
Text.Tasks.3.UiData.Name: Area
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Click Storage to begin storage planning.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the Build mode.
Text.Tasks.7.TaskDesc: Select the storage.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Open the Storage menu.
Text.Tasks.8.UiData.Name: Filter
Text.Tasks.9.TipsData.Desc: An expanded storage will keep the filter settings of the original storage.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Close the Storage menu.
Text.Tasks.12.TipsData.Desc: When the area of the field can no longer satisfy the inner disciples' needs, the player can expand the field to increase the acreage of the area for plants.
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Use the hotkey {0} to open the Build page.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Click Field to begin field planning.
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Drag to expand the field.
Text.Tasks.16.TaskDesc: Right-click to cancel the Build mode.
Text.Tasks.18.TipsData.Desc: An expanded field will keep the plant settings of the original field.
Text.Tasks.18.TipsData.Name: Grow Plants
Text.Tasks.20.TipsData.Desc: There are similar areas in the game that can be expanded in this way, so this tutorial will not go into detail about them.
